attributes.action: Stop illegal parking on footpaths in ballycastle and other towns.
attributes.background: People are illegally parking on footpaths.woman with prams.Childern  and people with disabilities have to walk onto the road to get past.Traffic wardens,police and local councillors won't do anything about it.some one is going to get critical injured or killed.so please sign and share

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/116289

If you would like action on parking in Ballycastle, you should take this up with your local council. You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out how to contact your council:

https://www.nidirect.gov.uk/contacts/local-councils-in-northern-ireland
